SELECT TOP (100) [Calendar]
,[Col2]
 FROM [dbo].[OES_ExternalTable2]



-- CONVERSTION ERROR BELOW. Do data mergt in CSV instead, build external data source from there.
INSERT INTO [dbo].[OES_ExternalTable2]
SELECT
    [C1], [C2]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net/raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs/DCC/CannabisTaxRevenues.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]



-- Insert the whole CSV
INSERT INTO [dbo].[CannabisTaxRevExtTable]
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net/raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs/DCC/CannabisTaxRevenues.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
